title: ‘Is Amy A Bad Mom?’: Gave Daughter Cough Medicine from Shot Glass + Lead Singer Fantasy Draft + Baby Box Update: Rat Tail Hair Style Debate
itunes:title: ‘Is Amy A Bad Mom?’: Gave Daughter Cough Medicine from Shot Glass + Lead Singer Fantasy Draft + Baby Box Update: Rat Tail Hair Style Debate
description:
Amy gave her daughter cough medicine using a shot glass…so we play a game called “Is Amy A Bad Mom”?  We draft our favorite lead singers in our fantasy draft and get a Baby Box update about Lunchbox wanting to give his son a rat tail.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
